description:
Business registrations

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
52311 Statistics of business notifications

Definition:
Business registrations are considered as business
notifications, as are business modifications and business
deregistrations.
The notification obligation applies to independent
businesses, branch establishments and dependent branch
offices. A business registration is required when a new
activity is taken up, a business is taken over (acquisition,
lease or succession), a partner joins the business, a new
legal status is chosen, the business is transferred to
another district, or a business has been set up in
accordance with the Transformation Act.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Business registrations
